A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie could be renamed The Last Time I Care About This Franchise.

Far too much humour (or attempts at least)\, too many plot holes/conveniences\, and too many things that were set up in TFA that are either not answered or answered in a way that wasn't fully satisfying.

This was probably the weakest SW movie (not including the SW Holiday Special) and I left the theatre feeling that it could be the last SW movie I ever watch as it didn't leave me with any motivation to want to fork out money for the next instalment.
